label.en:
Welcome to the ZEW Private Debt Survey, a new quarterly survey covering de­vel­op­ments on the European Private Debt markets. In this survey, we will refer to your Corporate Direct Lending, Real Estate Debt and Infrastructure Debt in­vest­ments and will address quantitative and qualitative aspects of your in­vest­ments and in­vest­ment strategies.

We highly ap­pre­ci­ate your participation in this survey. With your an­swers, you are contributing to the collection of richer data around private credit in­vest­ments strengthening the private debt markets and supporting investors to make qualified in­vest­ment decisions. We would therefore like to ask you to fill out the online ques­tion­naire as com­plete­ly as possible.

As a participant, you will receive a detailed report from us with aggregated and anonymous survey results after each survey round.

All responses to this survey will be treated as strictly confidential and in compliance with the GDPR. We will only pass on aggregated, anonymized responses to our cooperation partner Prime Capital AG, who will write the report. Only if you give your explicit consent, we will also pass on your individual an­swers to Prime Capital AG in non-anonymized form. In this case no personal data is passed on to Prime Capital AG, only the company name and the an­swers given in the survey. Prime Capital AG will not pass on the data received and will only process this data within the scope of the busi­ness activities of the In­vest­ment Advisory & Solutions division, in particular for the purposes of database enrichment in the context of manager selection or for the purpose of deriving capital market assumptions. All details regarding data protection can be found in the legal notice.

Thank you very much for your support and time.
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Which asset classes do you invest in?

label.de: a.)   Av­er­age cash margin over the re­le­vant base ratePleases state the av­er­age cash margin over the re­le­vant base rate for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1]. Only re­le­vant for floating rate loans.
label.en: a.)   Av­er­age cash margin over the re­le­vant base ratePleases state the av­er­age cash margin over the re­le­vant base rate for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1]. Only re­le­vant for floating rate loans.

label.de: b.)   Av­er­age interest rate floorPlease state the av­er­age interest floor for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1]. Only re­le­vant for floating rate loans.
label.en: b.)   Av­er­age interest rate floorPlease state the av­er­age interest floor for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1]. Only re­le­vant for floating rate loans.

label.de: c.)   Av­er­age fixed rate couponPlease state the av­er­age fixed rate copuon for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1]. Only re­le­vant for fixed rate loans.
label.en: c.)   Av­er­age fixed rate couponPlease state the av­er­age fixed rate copuon for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1]. Only re­le­vant for fixed rate loans.

label.de: d.)   Av­er­age upfront feePlease state the av­er­age upfront fees charged to the borrower for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1].
label.en: d.)   Av­er­age upfront feePlease state the av­er­age upfront fees charged to the borrower for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1].

label.de: e.)   Av­er­age expected Gross IRRPlease state the av­er­age expected Gross Internal Rate of Return (IRR) for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1].
label.en: e.)   Av­er­age expected Gross IRRPlease state the av­er­age expected Gross Internal Rate of Return (IRR) for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1].

label.de: a.)   Av­er­age number of covenantsPlease state the av­er­age number of financial covenants per loan for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1].
label.en: a.)   Av­er­age number of covenantsPlease state the av­er­age number of financial covenants per loan for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1].

label.de: b.)   Contracted maturityPlease state the av­er­age contracted maturity for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1].
label.en: b.)   Contracted maturityPlease state the av­er­age contracted maturity for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1].

label.de: c.)   Opening leveragePlease state the av­er­age opening leverage for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1]. Opening leverage is measured as a multile of EBITDA.
label.en: c.)   Opening leveragePlease state the av­er­age opening leverage for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1]. Opening leverage is measured as a multile of EBITDA.

label.de: d.)   Av­er­age EBITDAPlease state the av­er­age EBITDA of borrower companies for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1].
label.en: d.)   Av­er­age EBITDAPlease state the av­er­age EBITDA of borrower companies for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1].

label.de: e.)   Av­er­age EVPlease state the av­er­age enterprise value of borrower companies for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1].
label.en: e.)   Av­er­age EVPlease state the av­er­age enterprise value of borrower companies for trans­ac­tions closed in [quarter-1].

label.de: A3.   European Corporate Direct Lending:    Market assessment in Q4 2022
label.en: A3.   European Corporate Direct Lending:    Market assessment in Q4 2022

label.de: The following questions are related to the de­vel­op­ments of the overall European Corporate Direct Lending market.
label.en: The following questions are related to the de­vel­op­ments of the overall European Corporate Direct Lending market.

label.de: 3.1   Overall market environ­mentOver the past quarter, how do you assess the overall market environ­ment?
label.en: 3.1   Overall market environ­mentOver the past quarter, how do you assess the overall market environ­ment?

label.de: a.)   Last 3 monthsOver the past quarter, how do you assess the overall market environ­ment?
label.en: a.)   Last 3 monthsOver the past quarter, how do you assess the overall market environ­ment?

label.de: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the overall market environ­ment to change over the coming quarter?
label.en: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the overall market environ­ment to change over the coming quarter?

label.de: 3.2   PricingPlease assess the attractiveness of the pricing of new loans relative to their risk profile.
label.en: 3.2   PricingPlease assess the attractiveness of the pricing of new loans relative to their risk profile.

label.de: a.)   Last 3 monthsOver the past quarter, how attractive is the pricing of new loans you observed in the market?
label.en: a.)   Last 3 monthsOver the past quarter, how attractive is the pricing of new loans you observed in the market?

label.de: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the attractiveness of pricing of new loans to change in the coming quarter?
label.en: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the attractiveness of pricing of new loans to change in the coming quarter?

label.de: 3.3   Quality of doc­u­men­ta­tionPlease assess the quality of deal doc­u­men­ta­tion for new deals you observe in the market (stricter loan doc­u­men­ta­tion=im­proved, looser loan doc­u­men­ta­tion=de­clined).
label.en: 3.3   Quality of doc­u­men­ta­tionPlease assess the quality of deal doc­u­men­ta­tion for new deals you observe in the market (stricter loan doc­u­men­ta­tion=im­proved, looser loan doc­u­men­ta­tion=de­clined).

label.de: a.)   Last 3 monthsOver the past quarter, how do you assess the quality of loan doc­u­men­ta­tion (e.g. covenant quality, enforcement rights, ...)?
label.en: a.)   Last 3 monthsOver the past quarter, how do you assess the quality of loan doc­u­men­ta­tion (e.g. covenant quality, enforcement rights, ...)?

label.de: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the quality of loan doc­u­men­ta­tion (e.g. covenant quality, enforcement rights, â¦) to change in the coming quarter?
label.en: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the quality of loan doc­u­men­ta­tion (e.g. covenant quality, enforcement rights, â¦) to change in the coming quarter?

label.de: 3.4   Deal flowPlease assess the deal flow you observe in the market.
label.en: 3.4   Deal flowPlease assess the deal flow you observe in the market.

label.de: a.)   Last 3 monthsOver the past quarter, how do you assess the deal flow in the market?
label.en: a.)   Last 3 monthsOver the past quarter, how do you assess the deal flow in the market?

label.de: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the deal flow to change in the coming quarter?
label.en: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the deal flow to change in the coming quarter?

label.en: A3.   European Corporate Direct Lending:    Market assessment in Q4 2022 (continued)

label.de:
3.5   What do you think are the main risks for your in­vest­ment strategy over the next 3 months?
Please rank the top three.Please choose from list - for example: busi­ness cycle, interest rates, in­fla­ti­on/deflation, regulatory environ­ment, supply chain disruptions, health issues (e.g. covid), demographic change, other (free text).
label.en:
3.5   What do you think are the main risks for your in­vest­ment strategy over the next 3 months?
Please rank the top three.Please choose from list - for example: busi­ness cycle, interest rates, in­fla­ti­on/deflation, regulatory environ­ment, supply chain disruptions, health issues (e.g. covid), demographic change, other (free text).

msg.de: Keine Prio zweimal
msg.en: Priorities not twice

label.de:
3.6   What GICS sectors do you expect to be most challenging in the next three months? Please rank the top three.
Please rank the top three.Choose from sectors based on GICS: energy, materials, ... , real estate
label.en:

Please rank the top three.Choose from sectors based on GICS: energy, materials, ... , real estate

msg.de: Keine Prio zweimal
msg.en: Priorities not twice

label.de: The following questions are aimed to capture your views on the de­vel­op­ments of the overall European Real Estate Debt market.
label.en: The following questions are aimed to capture your views on the de­vel­op­ments of the overall European Real Estate Debt market.

label.de: 3.1   Overall market environ­mentOver the past quarter, how do you assess the overall market environ­ment?
label.en: 3.1   Overall market environ­mentOver the past quarter, how do you assess the overall market environ­ment?

label.de: a.)   Last 3 monthsOver the past quarter, how do you assess the overall market environ­ment?
label.en: a.)   Last 3 monthsOver the past quarter, how do you assess the overall market environ­ment?

label.de: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the overall market environ­ment to change over the coming quarter?
label.en: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the overall market environ­ment to change over the coming quarter?

label.de: 3.2   PricingPlease assess the attractiveness of the pricing of new loans relative to their risk profile.
label.en: 3.2   PricingPlease assess the attractiveness of the pricing of new loans relative to their risk profile.

label.de: a.)   Last 3 monthsOver the past quarter, how attractive is the pricing of new loans you observed in the market?
label.en: a.)   Last 3 monthsOver the past quarter, how attractive is the pricing of new loans you observed in the market?

label.de: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the attractiveness of pricing of new loans to change in the coming quarter?
label.en: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the attractiveness of pricing of new loans to change in the coming quarter?

label.de: 3.3   Quality of doc­u­men­ta­tionPlease assess the quality of deal doc­u­men­ta­tion for new deals you observe in the market (stricter loan doc­u­men­ta­tion=im­proved, looser loan doc­u­men­ta­tion=de­clined).
label.en: 3.3   Quality of doc­u­men­ta­tionPlease assess the quality of deal doc­u­men­ta­tion for new deals you observe in the market (stricter loan doc­u­men­ta­tion=im­proved, looser loan doc­u­men­ta­tion=de­clined).

label.de: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the quality of loan doc­u­men­ta­tion (e.g. covenant quality, enforcement rights, â¦) to change in the coming quarter?
label.en: b.)   Next 3 monthsHow do you expect the quality of loan doc­u­men­ta­tion (e.g. covenant quality, enforcement rights, â¦) to change in the coming quarter?

3.5   What do you think are the main risks for your in­vest­ment strategy over the next 3 months?
Please rank the top three.Please choose from list - for example: busi­ness cycle, interest rates, in­fla­ti­on/deflation, regulatory environ­ment, supply chain disruptions, health issues (e.g. covid), demographic change, other (free text).
label.en:
3.5   What do you think are the main risks for your in­vest­ment strategy over the next 3 months?
Please rank the top three.Please choose from list - for example: busi­ness cycle, interest rates, in­fla­ti­on/deflation, regulatory environ­ment, supply chain disruptions, health issues (e.g. covid), demographic change, other (free text).

msg.en: Priorities not twice

Declaration of consent acc­ording to GDPR
We will treat the an­swers to this online survey strictly confidential, GDPR-compliant and only use them in anonymous or aggregated form. We will pass on your an­swers to the questions within the ZEW Private Debt Survey to our cooperation partner Prime Capital AG in an aggregated and anonymous form. In the imprint you find extensive in­for­ma­tion on data protection.
I hereby consent to my collected data being used for the ZEW Private Debt Survey.
Declaration of consent to forward an­swers in non-anonymized form to Prime Capital AG:

I hereby agree that the an­swers I have given as part of the ZEW Private Debt Survey will be passed on to Prime Capital AG in non-anonymized form. No personal data is passed on to Prime Capital AG, only the company name and the an­swers given in the survey. Prime Capital AG will not pass on the data received and will only process this data within the scope of the busi­ness activities of the In­vest­ment Advisory & Solutions division, in particular for the purposes of database enrichment in the context of manager selection or for the purpose of deriving capital market assumptions.
I do not agree with my data being forwarded to Prime Capital AG in non-anonymized form.
